openj9.lang.management.InvalidOptionException

    Package Description
    openj9.lang.management
    OpenJ9 management extensions to java.lang.management.

    • Uses of InvalidOptionException in openj9.lang.management

      Methods in openj9.lang.management that throw InvalidOptionException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OpenJ9DiagnosticsMXBean.setDumpOptions(String dumpOptions)
      This function sets options for the dump subsystem.
      String OpenJ9DiagnosticsMXBean.triggerClassicHeapDump()
      This function triggers the heap dump agent and requests for a heap dump in CLASSIC format.

      This function triggers the specified dump agent.
